spell.name: Shocking Bursts
entries: Electric shocks burst from each of your hands. Make a ranged spell attack for each burst. You can aim the bursts at one target or two. You have advantage on the attack roll if the target is made of metal, or wearing metal armor. On a hit the target takes {@damage 3d6} Lightning damage.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: For every level above 2nd, the targets take {@dice 1d6} more lightning damage on a hit.

spell.name: Permafrost
entries: Ice coats one creature you can see within range. The target must make a Constitution saving throw. It takes {@damage 8d6} Cold damage on a failed save, or half as much on a success. In addition, on a failure the creature is frozen for the duration. The frozen target has its speed reduced by 30. At the end of each of its turns the target repeats the saving throw. It takes {@damage 2d6} Cold damage on a failed save, and the spell ends on a successful one. If this damage kills a target, it becomes a frozen statue until thawed.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: For every level above third, the creature takes an additional {@damage 1d6} damage on each failed save.

spell.name: Ice Spear
entries: You evoke an icy spear in your free hand. The spear is similar in size and shape to a pike, and it lasts for the duration. If you let go of the spear, it disappears, but you can evoke the spear again as a bonus action.
You can use your action to make a melee spell attack with the icy spear. This attack has a reach of 10 feet. On a hit, the target takes {@damage 2d8} cold damage.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 4th level or higher, the damage increases by {@dice 1d8} for every two slot levels above 2nd.

spell.name: Acid Pool
entries: You hurl a glob of acid at a point on a surface within range. For the duration, an acid pool forms a circle on that surface with a radius of 5 feet from that point. Any creature touching that surface or who touches it during the duration must make a dexterity saving throw. A creature takes {@damage 3d8} acid damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one. Nonmagical objects that aren't being carried or worn also take the damage if they touch the surface.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 3rd level or higher, the Acid damage increases by {@dice 1d8} per level above 2nd.

spell.name: Ice Blades
entries: You freeze the water in the air near you into six shards of ice that float in your space. You can magically fling each shard at a creature within range. Make a spell attack roll against each target for each shard. On a hit, the target takes {@damage 1d6} piercing damage. Hit or miss the shard explodes. The target and any creature within 5 feet of it must make a Dexterity saving throw. On a failure they take {@damage 1d6} cold damage, or half on a success.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 4th level or higher, you create an additional shard of ice to fling per level above 3rd.

spell.name: Charged Weapon
entries: You touch a weapon made of steel or iron. When a target is hit by a melee weapon attack using that weapon, the target takes an extra {@damage 1d6} lightning damage. The spell's magic ends when twelve attacks with the weapon have been made.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 4th level or higher, the number attacks that can be made before this spell ends increases by two for each slot level above 3rd.
